## ğŸ“… Week-at-a-Glance

| Day | Theme | Morning Focus | Afternoon Lab | Deliverable |
|-----|-------|---------------|---------------|-------------|
| **Day 1** | Foundations & Environment | Pipeline concepts, architecture patterns, tool landscape | Environment setup, first extraction | Working dev environment + extracted dataset |
| **Day 2** | Data Extraction & Ingestion | Sources, APIs, batch vs streaming, data contracts | Build multi-source ingestion pipeline | Bronze layer with 3 data sources |
| **Day 3** | Transformation & Modeling | dbt, data quality, schema design, testing | Transform Bronze â†’ Silver â†’ Gold | Complete dimensional model with tests |
| **Day 4** | Orchestration & Monitoring | Airflow, scheduling, error handling, observability | Orchestrate full pipeline with alerts | Scheduled DAG with monitoring dashboard |
| **Day 5** | Production & Deployment | CI/CD, documentation, teaching adaptation | Deploy pipeline + create curriculum | Production-ready pipeline + lesson plan |

## ğŸ“ Program Learning Objectives

By the end of this 5-day program, participants will be able to:

| # | Objective | Day Achieved |
|---|-----------|--------------|
| 1 | **Explain** modern data pipeline architectures and the ETLâ†’ELT evolution | Day 1 |
| 2 | **Extract** data from multiple sources (files, APIs, databases) with proper error handling | Day 2 |
| 3 | **Transform** raw data through Bronzeâ†’Silverâ†’Gold layers using dbt | Day 3 |
| 4 | **Orchestrate** complex DAGs with scheduling, dependencies, and retry logic | Day 4 |
| 5 | **Monitor** pipeline health using logs, metrics, and alerts | Day 4 |
| 6 | **Deploy** pipelines with CI/CD and version control best practices | Day 5 |
| 7 | **Adapt** workshop content into student-ready curriculum modules | Day 5 |

## ğŸ—ï¸ Capstone Project: End-to-End Pipeline

Throughout the 5 days, participants build a **complete production pipeline** for one of these scenarios:

### Project Options

| Option | Scenario | Data Sources | Business Value |
|--------|----------|--------------|----------------|
| **A** | ğŸ« **ITE Student Analytics** | Attendance CSV, Grades API, Demographics DB | Weekly performance dashboard for HODs |
| **B** | ğŸ›’ **E-commerce Operations** | Orders API, Products CSV, Customers DB | Real-time sales dashboard + inventory alerts |
| **C** | ğŸŒ¡ï¸ **Smart Campus IoT** | Sensor streams, Weather API, Energy CSV | Facility management optimization |
| **D** | ğŸ“‚ **Bring Your Own** | Participant's real ITE data (sanitized) | Customized to actual teaching needs |

### Progressive Build Schedule

### Core Tools (All Days)

| Tool | Purpose | Access |
|------|---------|--------|

## ğŸ“Š Assessment & Certification

### Daily Checkpoints

| Day | Checkpoint | Pass Criteria |
|-----|------------|---------------|
| 1 | Environment validation | All tools installed and working |
| 2 | Bronze layer review | Data from 3 sources in Bronze tables |
| 3 | dbt test results | All schema tests pass |
| 4 | DAG execution | Pipeline runs end-to-end on schedule |
| 5 | Final demo | Complete pipeline + curriculum outline |

### Certification Requirements

- [ ] Attend all 5 days (or complete makeup sessions)
- [ ] Pass all daily checkpoints
- [ ] Submit final capstone project
- [ ] Present 5-minute demo on Day 5
- [ ] Submit draft curriculum adaptation

**Certificate Issued:** ITE-Maltem Data Pipelining Proficiency

## ğŸ‘¥ Participant Preparation

### Pre-Program (1 Week Before)

| Task | Time Required | Instructions |
|------|---------------|--------------|
| Create Databricks account | 15 mins | databricks.com/try-databricks |
| Install Docker Desktop | 20 mins | docker.com/products/docker-desktop |
| Install VS Code + Extensions | 15 mins | Provided setup guide |
| Clone workshop repo | 10 mins | GitHub link provided |
| Complete pre-assessment | 20 mins | Skills self-assessment form |
| Choose project option | 10 mins | Review options, select one |

### What to Bring Each Day

- Laptop with charger
- Notebook for sketching
- Curiosity and questions!
